description:
Sharing the stage is Amit Choubey, a Gold Medalist in Tabla from Indira Kala
Sangeet Vishwavidyalay, trained under Pt. Karodilal Bhatt, Ustad Zakir
Hussain, and Pt. Yogesh Samsi. Known for combining the rigour of tradition
with modern percussion innovation, Amit brings rhythmic mastery to this
specially curated concert Blues for Saraswathi, an exploration of genres in
Prasanna's inimitable style.
name: Windmills Music Night - Blues For Saraswathi

performer.description: Experience a unique musical journey with visionary guitarist Prasanna and tabla virtuoso Amit Choubey. Hailed by Guthrie Govan as someone who “plays like nobody on the planet,” Prasanna blends jazz, blues, Carnatic, and rock with his signature microtonal gamaka, creating rich, emotive soundscapes. His acclaimed works include Electric Ganesha Land, Be the Change, and his most adventurous album All Terrain Guitar, featuring global jazz luminaries.
performer.name: Blues For Saraswathi

description:
It is an aural punch in the gut, delivered with a velvet glove. The raw power
of Sarvjeet Tamta's vocals makes one shake one's head in wonder and then shake
it many more times with the sheer joy that infuses the music. It is not easy
to resist the magnetic charm, the sheer power of the music that comes from the
very depths of their hearts and reaches the very depths of the listeners' as
well." \- Sarthak Kaushik, 104.6FM.
name: Windmills Music Night - Rehmat-e-Nusrat

performer.description: Formed by lead vocalist & harmonium virtuoso Sarvjeet Tamta, Rehmat-e-Nusrat brings a fresh new perspective to the timeless tradition of qawwali music. These young musicians perform original compositions and qawwalis, Sufiyana kalaams by great poets, and Kabir bhajans.
performer.name: Rehmat-e-Nusrat

description:
The Ravi Iyer Fusion Quartet is a world fusion project led by acclaimed
guitarist, composer, and educator Ravi Iyer. Blending Hindustani and Carnatic
classical with rock and jazz, his original compositions feature intricate
melodies and rhythmic patterns that engage and inspire.
name: Windmills Music Night - The Ravi Iyer Fusion Quartet

performer.description: The Ravi Iyer Fusion Quartet is a world fusion project led by acclaimed guitarist, composer, and educator Ravi Iyer. Blending Hindustani and Carnatic classical with rock and jazz, his original compositions feature intricate melodies and rhythmic patterns that engage and inspire.
performer.name: The Ravi Iyer Fusion Quartet
performer.url: Todi Jaldi | The Ravi Iyer Fusion Quartet
